Fixes [NT-4](https://notionai.atlassian.net/browse/NT-4)
Fixes [NT-1206](https://notionai.atlassian.net/browse/NT-1206)

### What the pull request does
- Moves drafts into messages 
  - Drafts are just `messages` with a property `is_draft: true` 
- Try persisting draft once `to`, `subject`, or `body` are defined.
- Add draft persistence via draft cloud api

### Where should the reviewer start?
`modules/compose/components/index.js`
`src/modules/drafts/effects.js`

### Screen recordings (if appropriate)
![editing-drafts](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1278367/22663424/8b7c3d8e-ec7a-11e6-905e-718d30e7b62c.gif)

## Remaining work
- [x] Remove attachments
- [x] Clean up pass
- [x] Flow typing
- [x]
